summary: The FLRAA Production Acceleration Act of 2025 authorizes the Secretary of the Army to expedite the procurement of future long-range assault aircraft (FLRAA) by initiating early production of up to 24 aircraft. The bill aims to accelerate operational capability, maintain workforce continuity, stabilize the industrial base, and mitigate cost escalation. The Secretary of the Army is required to report to Congress on the implementation plan, industrial base readiness, and estimated benefits. The bill prioritizes program continuity, utilizes lessons learned, and maintains design flexibility for future upgrades. This is a bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to accelerate the procurement of the future long range assault aircraft.
